description: ISD Observation Summary for single surface station

targets.rawSql: SELECT $station;
SELECT usaf FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT wban FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT ST_AsLatLonText(location) FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT elevation FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT country::TEXT FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT name FROM isd.world_fences WHERE ST_Contains(fence60m, '$location'::GEOMETRY(Point)) ;
SELECT name FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT period FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT icao::TEXT FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT province, city, name FROM isd.china_fences c WHERE ST_Contains(c.fence, '$location'::GEOMETRY);
SELECT extract(year FROM year) AS year,m1,m2,m3,m4,m5,m6,m7,m8,m9,m10,m11,m12,station FROM isd.history WHERE station = '$station';

SELECT station, name, '$location'::GEOMETRY::GEOGRAPHY <-> h.location::GEOGRAPHY AS distance,
       country, ST_AsLatLonText(location) AS location, elevation, begin_date::TEXT AS start, end_date::TEXT AS end
FROM isd.station h
ORDER BY '$location'::GEOMETRY <-> h.location LIMIT 16;

SELECT longitude,
       latitude,
       elevation,
       name,
       station,
       upper(period)::DATE::TEXT  AS mtime,
       country,
       CASE
           WHEN station = '$station' THEN 3
           WHEN upper(period) >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) THEN 2
           WHEN upper(period) >= date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE) THEN 1
           ELSE 0 END AS category -- 0 active in this month, 1 active in this year, 0 default
FROM isd.station
ORDER BY '$location'::GEOMETRY <-> location LIMIT 512;

SELECT 
       min(temp_min)     AS temp_min,     -- 最低气温
       max(temp_max)     AS temp_max,     -- 最高气温
       max(prcp_sum)     AS prcp_sum,     -- 总降水
       max(prcp_max)     AS prcp_max,     -- 最大降水
       max(wdsp_max)     AS wdsp_max,     -- 最大风速
       max(gust_max)     AS gust_max,     -- 最大阵风
       max(sunny_days)   AS sunny_days,   -- 晴天日数
       max(windy_days)   AS windy_days,   -- 大风日数
       max(foggy_days)   AS foggy_days,   -- 雾天日数
       max(rainy_days)   AS rainy_days,   -- 雨天日数
       max(snowy_days)   AS snowy_days,   -- 雪天日数
       max(hail_days)    AS hail_days,    -- 冰雹日数
       max(thunder_days) AS thunder_days, -- 雷暴日数
       max(tornado_days) AS tornado_days, -- 龙卷日数
       max(hot_days)     AS hot_days,     -- 高温日数
       max(cold_days)    AS cold_days,    -- 低温日数
       max(vis_4_days)   AS vis_4_days,   -- 能见度4km内日数
       max(vis_20p_days) AS vis_20p_days  -- 能见度20km上日数
FROM isd.yearly
WHERE station = '$station'
GROUP by station
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT to_char(ts, 'YYYY') AS year, -- 年份时间戳,yyyy-01-01
       temp_min,                    -- 年最低气温
       temp_max,                    -- 年最高气温
       dewp_min,                    -- 年最低露点
       dewp_max,                    -- 年最高露点
       prcp_sum,                    -- 年总降水
       prcp_max,                    -- 年最大降水
       wdsp_max,                    -- 年最大风速
       gust_max,                    -- 年最大阵风
       sunny_days,                  -- 年晴天日数
       windy_days,                  -- 年大风日数
       foggy_days,                  -- 年雾天日数
       rainy_days,                  -- 年雨天日数
       snowy_days,                  -- 年雪天日数
       hail_days,                   -- 年冰雹日数
       thunder_days,                -- 年雷暴日数
       tornado_days,                -- 年龙卷日数
       hot_days,                    -- 年高温日数
       cold_days,                   -- 年低温日数
       vis_4_days,                  -- 年能见度4km内日数
       vis_10_days,                 -- 年能见度4-10km内日数
       vis_20_days,                 -- 年能见度10-20km内日数
       vis_20p_days,                 -- 年能见度20km上日数
       '' AS comment
FROM isd.yearly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT to_char(ts, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, -- 月份
       to_char(ts + '1Month'::INTERVAL, 'YYYY-MM') AS next_month, -- 下个月份
       temp_mean    ,-- 月平均气温
       temp_min     ,-- 月平均最低气温
       temp_max     ,-- 月平均最高气温
       temp_min_avg ,-- 月极端最低气温
       temp_max_avg ,-- 月极端最高气温
       dewp_mean    ,-- 月平均露点
       dewp_min     ,-- 月最低露点
       dewp_max     ,-- 月最高露点
       slp_mean     ,-- 月平均气压
       prcp_sum     ,-- 月总降水
       prcp_max     ,-- 月最大降水
       prcp_mean    ,-- 月平均降水
       wdsp_mean    ,-- 月平均风速
       wdsp_max     ,-- 月最大风速
       gust_max     ,-- 月最大阵风
       sunny_days   ,-- 月晴天日数
       windy_days   ,-- 月大风日数
       foggy_days   ,-- 月雾天日数
       rainy_days   ,-- 月雨天日数
       snowy_days   ,-- 月雪天日数
       hail_days    ,-- 月冰雹日数
       thunder_days ,-- 月雷暴日数
       tornado_days ,-- 月龙卷日数
       hot_days     ,-- 月高温日数
       cold_days    ,-- 月低温日数
       vis_4_days   ,-- 月能见度4km内日数
       vis_10_days  ,-- 月能见度4-10km内日数
       vis_20_days  ,-- 月能见度10-20km内日数
       vis_20p_days , -- 月能见度20km上日数
       '' AS comment
FROM isd.monthly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts AS time,
       (NOT is_foggy AND NOT is_rainy AND NOT is_snowy AND NOT is_hail AND NOT is_thunder AND
        NOT is_tornado)::INTEGER AS "晴",
       is_foggy::INTEGER         AS "雾",
       is_rainy::INTEGER         AS "雨",
       is_snowy::INTEGER         AS "雪",
       is_hail::INTEGER          AS "雹",
       is_thunder::INTEGER       AS "雷",
       is_tornado::INTEGER       AS "龙卷"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       temp_mean AS "Daily Average",
       temp_min  AS "Daily Minimum",
       temp_max  AS "Daily Maximum",
       temp_count AS "Count"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       dewp_mean  AS "日均露点",
       temp_mean AS "日平均温度",
       dewp_count AS "聚合记录数"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       slp_mean  AS "海平面气压",
       1013.25   AS "标准大气压",
       slp_count AS "聚合记录数"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       wdsp_mean  AS "平均风速",
       wdsp_max   AS "最大持续风速",
       gust AS "阵风"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       prcp  AS "降水",
       sndp   AS "雪深"
FROM isd.daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

list.definition: SELECT station FROM isd.station  WHERE period && daterange($__timeFrom()::DATE, $__timeTo()::DATE, '[]');
list.label: Station
list.name: station
list.query: SELECT station FROM isd.station  WHERE period && daterange($__timeFrom()::DATE, $__timeTo()::DATE, '[]');

list.definition: SELECT location FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
list.label: Location
list.name: location
list.query: SELECT location FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';

list.definition: SELECT longitude FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
list.label: Longitude
list.name: longitude
list.query: SELECT longitude FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';

list.definition: SELECT latitude FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';
list.label: Latitude
list.name: latitude
list.query: SELECT latitude FROM isd.station WHERE station = '$station';

title: ISD Station
